record.dc:title: 12-72 Wallace [Farm] Cave Site 7CP12, Campbell County, Tennessee.
record.wpa:narrative: 3 miles southeast of Hatmaker, Campbell Co., TN. Height at entrance, 11' 6"; height at rear, 5'. Ceiling slopes to rear. Small entrance at rear NE corner of outer cavity leading into extensive caverns abundant in calcareous deposits. Depth of midden deposit varied from 18" at front to 3' at rear. Cave entrance is above level of Norris Dam Reservoir.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration on file at the institution. See also photograph 12-70 [fhm01883].
